comments.html:
It's nice to see an even spread but this is ridiculous.

comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
Absolutely ... I've been watching this stupidity for a few days now and hoped it's a Blogger glitch that will go away. Either someone is actively playing with the data (unlikely) or Blogger completely messed up the polling functionality.

It looks like the "migrate to Wordpress" item just moved way higher on my to-do list :(
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
